snippet.title: Restaurant Recipes | Apron Annie's Catering Tortellini Salad
snippet.description: Mary Jo Eggert, Waukesha, requested the recipe for tortellini salad from Apron Annie's Catering in Eagle. She wrote: "We attended a wedding reception at Old World Wisconsin and Apron Annie's did the catering. The tortellini salad was out of this world, and I would very much enjoy having
